FuncDef: The ldap-server authentication base-dn command configures the Base DN of an LDAP authentication server. The undo ldap-server authentication base-dn command restores the default Base DN of an LDAP authentication server. By default, no Base DN of an LDAP server is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the Base DN of an LDAP authentication server.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 characters, excluding question marks (?). If the character string contains spaces, it must be enclosed in double quotation marks (""). The length ranges from 3 to 129 characters and cannot contain only spaces.
